text: Kangelo Castle () is a historical fortress located in Kangelo Village, Savadkuh County, Mazandaran Province, Iran. Kangelo Castle was built during the time of the Sassanian Empire. According to historians, this castle was used as a place to worship the Mitra. =http://www.aftabir.com/lifestyle/view/130473/قلعه- کنگلو|ناشر=آفتاب|زبان=فارسی|عنوان=قلعه کنگلو|تاریخ بازدید=21/4/2011}} thumb ==References== Category:Castles in Iran Category:Buildings and structures in Mazandaran Province Category:National Works of Iran Category:Sasanian castles
title: Kangelo Castle
